attributes.action: Full pay for pregnant woman & high risk health conditions in advised isolation.
attributes.additional_details: Full pay for working pregnant woman and people with high risk health conditions that have been told to avoid social contact (self isolation) for 12 weeks
attributes.background: Full pay for working pregnant woman and people with high risk health conditions that have been told to avoid social contact (self isolation) for 12 weeks

rejection.details:
There’s already a similar petition about this issue. You are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302277

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
 
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
